episodes.title: Bee Mood: EDM, Cults & Kandi - Part 1
episodes.description:
In this episode of Groupie Effect, Alycia Grace sits down with transgender, non-binary raver, Bee Mood. The Minnesota based creator and founder of Mood Kandi is also a survivor of Scientology – an experience that has shaped their perspective on rave culture and PLUR. Join us for a discussion on the history of kandi, escaping Scientology and Bee’s relocation to Minnesota. 


Come back for part two where Bee and Alycia Grace discuss cult-like tendencies in EDM and how to combat it.
